Services

Workshop Servicing

The workshop is the engine room of our business, a place where your bicycle is cared for as if our own. We take pride in the quality of our workmanship whilst ensuring that you always receive the utmost value for your hard earned money. Excellent communication is fundamental and we will never carry out work that hasn't first been fully explained, understood and agreed with you. Repair not replace is our mantra, and unless it's no longer deemed viable from either a financial or mechanical sense we will always take this stance.

Our checklist for new builds is exhaustive. Where most bike shops carry out a P.D.I (pre delivery inspection) which consists of an (out of the box) basic construction, we go the extra mile......many extra miles! From removing, cutting, lubing and re-installing all the cables to ensure friction free, silky smooth operation,to making sure all the bearings are correctly greased and running free. Every customer and every bike deserves the absolute best. From a puncture repair to a full strip down / re-build, a buckled wheel to a bespoke wheel build, One More Bicycle's workshop is here for you.

Frame Building

Having a bicycle frame custom made is something many cyclists aspire to, completely unique in the world, a bike only you have, never the same thing made twice. Collaborating with the builder to create a frame that is perfect for your needs, tailored to your exact size. Selecting the tubing used to create a specific ride feel to picking the finishing colours is a special process, sure it takes time but the end result is a bike that will last forever.

We have established our own brand called 'North by Northwest' or NXNW for short to help you create the bicycle of your dreams. Working exclusively in Steel we use British tubing from 'Reynolds' and Italian tubing from 'Columbus' to lovingly fabricate and bring to life your ideas.
